metadata.title: CVE-2022-0547 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OpenVPN 2.1 until v2.4.12 and v2.5.6 may enable authentication bypass inexternal authentication plug-ins when more than one of them makes use ofdeferred authentication replies, which allows an external user to begranted access with only partially correct credentials.

criterions.comment: openvpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
